desc: Arba Dekor has been operating in the Albanian market since 1997, cooperating with the best manufacturers from Belgium and the Netherlands to provide high quality products in floor coverings such as carpets, rugs and PVC's (linoleum) with competitive prices. Moket, tapet, PVC, linoleum te cilesise me te larte. Tirane

layout.text: Premium quality rugs, carpets and PVC.
